name: Bullet Break (Ludumdare 41)
description:
*This game might take a minute to load for the first time*

*Ignore the red error messages, it will play fine*

Ludumdare 41 Theme: Combine 2 incompatible genres

This game is a mash up of a bullet hell game, and breakout

I decided to go without the bricks and have the game be about the bullets

Keep the balls alive and you can continue
